statements: SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles;
SELECT make, model FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT model, make, year FROM insured_vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles WHERE make LIKE 'Toy%' ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT id, make, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT make, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM insured_vehicles GROUP BY make HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE make LIKE 'To%' AND year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC, make ASC;
SELECT AVG(year) AS average_year, MAX(year) AS max_year, MIN(year) AS min_year FROM insured_vehicles;
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles WHERE model = 'Accord' OR (make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2010) ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT year, make, model FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance WHERE provider = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT policy_number, provider, start_date, end_date FROM insurance WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make LIKE 'H%' AND year < 2000;
SELECT v.make, v.model, i.provider FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN insurance i ON v.id = i.vehicle_id;
SELECT v.make, v.year, i.start_date, i.end_date FROM vehicles v LEFT JOIN insurance i ON v.id = i.vehicle_id WHERE i.start_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT id, name, address, phone_number FROM insurance_companies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM policies ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY make DESC, model ASC;
SELECT name, address FROM insurance_companies WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT iv.make, iv.model, ic.name FROM insured_vehicles iv JOIN insurance_companies ic ON iv.id = 1 AND ic.id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS policy_count, MAX(end_date) AS latest_policy_end_date FROM policies;

SELECT iv.make, SUM(pc.policy_count) AS total_policies FROM insured_vehicles iv JOIN (SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS policy_count FROM policies GROUP BY vehicle_id) pc ON iv.id = pc.vehicle_id ORDER BY total_policies DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone FROM insurance_agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT policy_holder, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email FROM insurance_agents WHERE agent_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles iv INNER JOIN insurance_policies ip ON iv.vehicle_id = ip.vehicle_id WHERE iv.make = 'Toyota';
SELECT make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles;
SELECT id, name FROM insurance_companies ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_owners WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM insured_vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM insured_vehicles WHERE make='Toyota' AND year=2015;
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM vehicle_owners WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, h.event_description FROM insured_vehicles v JOIN vehicle_history h ON v.id = h.vehicle_id WHERE h.event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY h.event_date DESC;
